items.title: Trump to announce $12 billion tariff relief for farmers
items.description: Farmers — particularly those who produce soybeans — have felt the impact of the president’s tariff policies.

items.title: Allred drops Senate bid in Texas, will instead run for redrawn House seat
items.description: The former Democratic congressman, who lost his 2024 Senate bid to Sen. Ted Cruz (R-Texas), says a bruising Senate primary could threaten party unity.

items.title: Democrats, who once lambasted Trump on immigration, have grown quiet
items.description: Democrats struggle to counter Trump’s tougher policies on immigration.

items.title: Trump pardons major drug traffickers despite his anti-drug rhetoric
items.description: The president has granted clemency to about 100 people accused of drug-related crimes during his two terms in office, a Post analysis shows.

items.title: Venezuela’s Maduro, shaken but still standing, aims to wait out Trump
items.description: Five months into the U.S. military buildup in the Caribbean, Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro is feeling the pressure but refusing to go into exile...
